com.smartgwt.client.widgets
Class UserFormula

java.lang.Object
  com.smartgwt.client.core.JsObject
      com.smartgwt.client.core.DataClass
          com.smartgwt.client.widgets.UserFormula

public class UserFormula
extends DataClass

An object representing a user-created and user-modifiable formula, which can be created and edited with a FormulaBuilder either directly or via the canAddFormulaFields behavior.

setJavaScriptObject

public void setJavaScriptObject(JavaScriptObject jsObj)

setFormulaVars

public void setFormulaVars(Map formulaVars)
Map from the single-letter capital letters used as formula variables in the formula String to the fieldNames these variables should represent in the context where the formula is evaluated.

Parameters:
formulaVars - formulaVars Default value is null

getFormulaVars

public Map getFormulaVars()
Map from the single-letter capital letters used as formula variables in the formula String to the fieldNames these variables should represent in the context where the formula is evaluated.

Returns:
Map

setText

public void setText(String text)
Formula to be evaluated. All variables used by the formula must be single-letter capital characters (eg A). These are derived from field values for the record in question - see formulaVars.

In addition to these variables, the keyword record may be used to refer directly to the record for which the formula is being displayed.

Parameters:
text - . See String. Default value is null

getText

public String getText()
Formula to be evaluated. All variables used by the formula must be single-letter capital characters (eg A). These are derived from field values for the record in question - see formulaVars.

In addition to these variables, the keyword record may be used to refer directly to the record for which the formula is being displayed.

Returns:
. See String
